languages.text: Once per combat, when a death world character suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect, this effect is ignored, and they instead gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as temporary wounds.
languages.original_text: Один раз за бой персонаж родом с мира смерти может игнорировать {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g}. Вместо этого персонаж получает +20% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве временного здоровья.

traits.locale_text: Once per combat, when a Death World character suffers Stunned, Blinded, or Immobilised condition, they ignore this condition and instead gain +20% Temporary Wounds to their maximum Wounds.
Once per combat, when a Death World character suffers Stunned, Blinded, or Immobilised condition, they ignore this condition and instead gain +20% Temporary Wounds to their maximum Wounds.

Once per combat, when a Death World character is suffering from the stunned, blinded, or immobilised condition, this condition is ignored and they instead gain +20% temporary wounds to their maximum wounds.

Once per combat, when a death world character suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect, this effect is ignored, and they instead gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as temporary wounds.

languages.text: Один раз за бой персонаж родом с мира смерти может игнорировать {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживание{/g}. Вместо этого персонаж получает +20% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} в качестве временного здоровья.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when a death world character suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect, this effect is ignored, and they instead gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: Один раз за бой персонаж родом из мира смерти может игнорировать оглушение, ослепление или обездвиживание. Вместо этого максимальное значение здоровья персонажа временно увеличивается на 20%.
Один раз за бой персонаж родом из мира смерти может игнорировать оглушение, ослепление или обездвиживание. Вместо этого максимальное значение здоровья персонажа временно увеличивается на 20%.

languages.text: Wenn ein Todesweltcharakter einmal pro Kampf unter dem Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} leidet, wird dieser Effekt ignoriert und er erhält stattdessen +20 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} als temporäre Wunden.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when a death world character suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect, this effect is ignored, and they instead gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein Todesweltcharakter einmal pro Kampf unter dem Zustand {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} leidet, wird dieser Zustand ignoriert und er erhält stattdessen +20% {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} auf seine {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Une fois par combat, lorsqu'un personnage d'un monde hostile est frappé d'{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} ou d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, cet effet est ignoré et il obtient un bonus de +20 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sous forme de blessures temporaires.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when a death world character suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect, this effect is ignored, and they instead gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: Une fois par combat, lorsqu'un personnage d'un monde hostile est frappé d'{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} ou d'{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, cet effet est ignoré et il obtient un bonus de +20 % de sa réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sous forme de blessures temporaires.

languages.text: 每场战斗中，每当死亡世界的角色首次承受{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}失明{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果时，抵抗此效果并获得{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于最大生命值的20%。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when a death world character suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect, this effect is ignored, and they instead gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: 每场战斗中，每当死亡世界的角色首次承受{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}失明{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态时，抵抗此状态并获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的20%。

每场战斗中，每当死亡世界的角色首次承受{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}失明{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果时，抵抗此效果并获得{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}最大生命值{/g}的20%。

languages.text: Una vez por combate, cuando un personaje de mundo letal sufre los estados {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, ignora el estado y en vez de sufrirlo gana +20 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} como heridas temporales.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when a death world character suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect, this effect is ignored, and they instead gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: Una vez por combate, cuando un personaje de mundo letal sufre de los estados {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, ignora el estado y en vez de sufrirlo gana +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} a sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g}.

languages.text: 戦闘ごとに一度、死地惑星のキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}状態になった時、この状態を無視して、代わりに最大体力に+20%の{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when a death world character suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect, this effect is ignored, and they instead gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as temporary wounds.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘ごとに一度、死地惑星のキャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}状態になった時、この状態を無視して、代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}に+20%の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Bir ölüm dünyası karakteri {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemleme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}körleşme{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} etkisine maruz kalırsa bu etki her çatışmada bir kez yok sayılır. Bunun yerine karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının +%20'si kadar geçici sağlık kazanır.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when a death world character suffers the {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} effect, this effect is ignored, and they instead gain +20% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} as temporary wounds.
